sqlMap.select:
SELECT DCP.DCPLANID AS dcPlanId, DCP.DCPLANDATE AS dcPlanDate, DCP.WIP AS wip, WIP.WIPNAME AS wipName, DCP.MACHINEID AS machineId, MAC.MACHINENO AS machineNo, DCP.SEQ AS seq, DCP.SHIFT AS shift, DCP.CUSTOMERID AS customerId, CUST.CUSTOMERNAME AS customerName, CUST.CUSTOMERCODE AS customerCode, DCP.QTY AS quantity, DCP.QTY AS qtyDefault, DCP.PARTID AS partId, PART.PARTNO + ' : ' + PART.PARTNAME AS partName, PART.SNP_WIP AS snpWip, DCP.ST AS st, DCP.REASONID AS reasonId, REASON.reasonName AS reasonName, DCP.GENSTATUS AS genStatus, DCP.GENSTATUS AS genStatusDefault, DCP.GENDATE AS genDate, DCP.GENBY AS genBy, DCP.CREATEDATE AS createDate, DCP.CREATEBY AS createdBy, DCP.UPDATEDATE AS lastUpdate, DCP.UPDATEBY AS updatedBy, DCP.MOLDID AS moldId, DCP.MOLDNO AS moldNo, M.MOLDNAME AS moldName, MD.CAVNO AS cavNo FROM T_DCPLAN DCP LEFT JOIN M_MACHINE MAC ON MAC.MACHINEID = DCP.MACHINEID LEFT JOIN M_CUSTOMER CUST ON CUST.CUSTOMERID = DCP.CUSTOMERID LEFT JOIN M_WIP WIP ON WIP.WIP = DCP.WIP LEFT JOIN M_PART PART ON PART.PARTID = DCP.PARTID LEFT JOIN M_REASON REASON ON REASON.REASONID = DCP.REASONID LEFT JOIN M_MOLD M ON M.MOLDID = DCP.MOLDID LEFT JOIN M_MOLD_DETAIL MD ON MD.MOLDID = DCP.MOLDID AND MD.MOLDNO = DCP.MOLDNO
CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DCP.DCPLANDATE, 103) LIKE '%' + #dateString# + '%'
DCP.WIP = #wip#
DCP.MACHINEID = #machineId#
ORDER BY DCP.MACHINEID, DCP.SEQ

sqlMap.select:
SELECT dcPlanId, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), dcPlanDate,103) AS dcPlanDate, wip, machineId, machineNo, seq, shift, customerId, customerCode, reasonId, reasonCode, reasonName, partId, partNo, partName, materialId, materialCode, materialGroup, st, quantity, snpWip, workOrderNo, startLotNo, endLotNo, genStatus, genDate, moldId, moldName, moldNo From ( SELECT DISTINCT DCP.dcPlanId AS dcPlanId, DCP.dcPlanDate AS dcPlanDate, DCP.wip AS wip, MAC.machineId AS machineId, MAC.machineNo AS machineNo, DCP.seq AS seq, DCP.shift AS shift, CUST.customerId AS customerId, CUST.customerCode AS customerCode, REA.reasonId AS reasonId, REA.reasonCode AS reasonCode, REA.reasonName AS reasonName, PT.partId AS partId, PT.partNo AS partNo, PT.partName AS partName, MAT.nMaterialId AS materialId, MAT.sMaterialCode AS materialCode, MAT.materialGroup AS materialGroup, DCP.st AS st, DCP.qty AS quantity, (select snp_wip from m_part p where partid = DCP.partid) AS snpWip, WKD.workOrderNo AS workOrderNo, WKD.startLot AS startLotNo, WKD.endLot AS endLotNo, DCP.genStatus AS genStatus, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DCP.genDate,103 ) + ' ' + CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DCP.genDate, 108) AS genDate, DCP.moldId AS moldId, M.moldName AS moldName, DCP.moldNo AS moldNo, MD.cavno AS cavNo FROM T_DCPLAN DCP LEFT JOIN M_PART PT ON PT.partId = DCP.partId LEFT JOIN M_MACHINE MAC ON MAC.machineId = DCP.machineId LEFT JOIN M_CUSTOMER CUST ON CUST.customerId = DCP.customerId LEFT JOIN M_REASON REA ON REA.reasonId = DCP.reasonId LEFT JOIN M_WORKORDER WKD ON WKD.dcPlanId = DCP.dcPlanId LEFT JOIN T_LOTNO LOT ON LOT.dcPlanId = DCP.dcPlanId LEFT JOIN M_MATERIAL MAT ON MAT.nMaterialId = PT.materialId LEFT JOIN M_MOLD M ON M.moldId = DCP.moldId LEFT JOIN M_MOLD_DETAIL MD ON MD.moldId = DCP.moldId AND MD.moldno = DCP.moldno
CONVERT(DATETIME,DCP.DCPLANDATE,103) >= CONVERT(DATETIME,#dcPlanDateFrom#,103)
CONVERT(DATETIME,DCP.DCPLANDATE,103) <= CONVERT(DATETIME,#dcPlanDateTo#,103)
DCP.WIP = #wip#
DCP.machineId = #machineId#
DCP.SHIFT = #shift#
DCP.customerId = #customerId#
DCP.reasonId = #reasonId#
PT.partNo LIKE '%' + #partNo# + '%'
PT.partName LIKE '%' + #partName# + '%'
DCP.GENSTATUS = #generateLot#
) as A ORDER BY a.dcPlanDate,a.machineNo ASC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT DCP.dcPlanId) FROM T_DCPLAN DCP LEFT JOIN M_PART PT ON PT.partId = DCP.partId LEFT JOIN M_MACHINE MAC ON MAC.machineId = DCP.machineId LEFT JOIN M_CUSTOMER CUST ON CUST.customerId = DCP.customerId LEFT JOIN M_REASON REA ON REA.reasonId = DCP.reasonId LEFT JOIN M_WORKORDER WKD ON WKD.dcPlanId = DCP.dcPlanId LEFT JOIN T_LOTNO LOT ON LOT.dcPlanId = DCP.dcPlanId LEFT JOIN M_MATERIAL MAT ON MAT.nMaterialId = PT.materialId
CONVERT(DATETIME,DCP.DCPLANDATE,103) >= CONVERT(DATETIME,#dcPlanDateFrom#,103)
CONVERT(DATETIME,DCP.DCPLANDATE,103) <= CONVERT(DATETIME,#dcPlanDateTo#,103)
DCP.WIP = #wip#
DCP.machineId = #machineId#
DCP.SHIFT = #shift#
DCP.customerId = #customerId#
DCP.reasonId = #reasonId#
PT.partNo LIKE '%' + #partNo# + '%'
PT.partName LIKE '%' + #partName# + '%'
DCP.GENSTATUS = #generateLot#

update.isNotNull: UPDATE T_DCPLAN SET GENSTATUS = 1, GENDATE = GETDATE(), GENBY = #createBy# WHERE DCPLANID = #dcPlanId#

sqlMap.select:
SELECT DCP.WIP AS wip, MAC.MACHINENO AS machineNo, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), DCP.DCPLANDATE, 103) AS dcPlanDate, DCP.SHIFT AS shift, WO.WORKORDERNO AS workOrderNo, LOT.LOTNO AS lotNo, CUS.CUSTOMERCODE AS customerCode, CUS.CUSTOMERNAME AS customerName, PART.PARTNO AS partNo, PART.PARTNAME AS partName, PART.SNP_WIP AS snpWip, LOT.LOTQTY AS quantity, LOT.PRINTSTATUS AS printingStatus, CONVERT(VARCHAR(20), LOT.PRINTDATE, 103) AS printDate, rea.reasonName AS reasonName, m.moldId AS moldId, m.moldName AS moldName, md.moldNo AS moldNo FROM T_LOTNO LOT INNER JOIN T_DCPLAN DCP ON DCP.DCPLANID = LOT.DCPLANID INNER JOIN M_WORKORDER WO ON WO.DCPLANID = DCP.DCPLANID LEFT JOIN M_CUSTOMER CUS ON CUS.CUSTOMERID = DCP.CUSTOMERID LEFT JOIN M_MACHINE MAC ON MAC.MACHINEID = DCP.MACHINEID LEFT JOIN M_PART PART ON PART.PARTID = DCP.PARTID LEFT JOIN m_reason rea ON rea.reasonid = DCP.reasonid LEFT JOIN m_mold m ON m.moldId = DCP.moldId LEFT JOIN m_mold_detail md ON md.moldId = DCP.moldId
DCP.wip = #wip#
LOT.lotNo BETWEEN #startLotNo# AND #endLotNo#
MAC.machineNo BETWEEN #machineFrom# AND #machineTo#
DCP.dcPlanDate BETWEEN CONVERT(DATETIME, SUBSTRING(#dcPlanDateFrom#, 7, 4) + SUBSTRING(#dcPlanDateFrom#, 4, 2) + SUBSTRING(#dcPlanDateFrom#, 1, 2)) AND CONVERT(DATETIME, SUBSTRING(#dcPlanDateTo#, 7, 4) + SUBSTRING(#dcPlanDateTo#, 4, 2) + SUBSTRING(#dcPlanDateTo#, 1, 2))
DCP.shift = #shift#
CUS.customerId = #customerId#
PART.partNo LIKE #partNo# + '%'
PART.partName LIKE #partName# + '%'
LOT.printStatus = #printStatus#
ORDER BY DCP.dcPlanDate
